message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $13,000 for it. I hope this meets your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $13,500.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's close this deal!
